ARABIC: فَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۢا بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكُمْ إِن كُنَّا عَنْ عِبَادَتِكُمْ لَغَٰفِلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah is a sufficient witness between us and you. We were unaware of your worship.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For God is sufficient as witness between us and you we were not aware of your worship."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah's witness suffices between you and us that (even if you worshipped us) we were totally unaware of your worshipping us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is Sufficient Witness for us that we were not aware of your worship".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Therefore Allah suffices as a Witness between us and you, that we were not even aware that you worshipped us!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So sufficient is Allah as a witness between us and you that we indeed knew nothing of your worship of us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore Allah is sufficient as a witness between us and you that we were quite unaware of your serving (us).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God is a sufficient witness between us and you; assuredly we were heedless of your service.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah sufficeth as a witness between us and you, that we were unaware of your worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God suffices as a witness between us and you. We were entirely unaware that you worshipped us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And God sufficieth as witness between you and us, of your worship, we have been ever unaware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah suffices as a witness between you and us. We were indeed unaware of your worship.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Enough is Allah for a witness between us and you: we certainly knew nothing of your worship of us!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So sufficient is Allah for a witness between us and you, that We indeed knew nothing of your worship of us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah is a Sufficient witness between us and you, surely, we were heedless of your worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “God is sufficient witness between us and you. We were unaware of your worshiping us.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And sufficient is Allah as a witness between us and you that we were of your worship unaware."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:29] God suffices as a witness between us and you, that indeed (in is softened, so [read as] innā) we were unaware of your worship’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: The disbelievers answer back and say: "you have indeed commanded us to worship", at which point the idols respond: (Allah sufficeth as a witness between us and you, that we were unaware of your worship) we were ignorant of your worship of us.
